Create a customized itinerary for a hiker based on their skill level, time constraints, and desired trail sections.
Develop a virtual reality experience that allows hikers to explore the Appalachian Trail from the comfort of their own homes.
Create a mobile app that tracks a hiker's progress on the trail and provides real-time information on weather, trail conditions, and local wildlife.
Develop a social media campaign that encourages hikers to share their experiences on the Appalachian Trail using a specific hashtag and tagging relevant locations.

Create a podcast series that features interviews with experienced hikers who have completed the Appalachian Trail, discussing their favorite memories, challenges, and advice for others planning to hike the trail.
